item.title: Apprentice Carpenter (Level 1)
item.description: Custom git hooks are installed which help catch issues before they are shared.

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 1)
item.description: Used git blame to annotates a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 1)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 1)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Librarian
item.description: Looked for change that introduce or remove a string with git log -S

item.title: Apprentice Historian (Level 1)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 1)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 1)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Caretaker
item.description: Added a .gitignore file to a repository.

item.title: Apprentice Locksmith (Level 1)
item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 1)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Stone Mason (Level 1)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 1)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.title: Baptised
item.description: Set global user name using git config.

item.title: Student
item.description: Accessed the documentation for a command with git [command] --help
